data.text:
Cookies

This site uses cookies so that we can offer the best possible user experience. Information about cookies is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognizing you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.

Data Protection

Thanks for visiting our website. Sports Value takes protecting your data very seriously. Your personal information is kept confidential in accordance with this data protection statement and legal data protection regulations.

Personal data

Personal data is Information that can be directly or indirectly associated with an individual, such as his name, email or address. We would like to highlight that the transfer of data on the internet (when sent by e-mail, for example) may contain security risks. Total protection against third party access to your data is not possible.

Application and Purpose

You have the opportunity to provide personal information on our website. Your data will be saved and used to answer your query, provide individual support or send information. We ensure that your data will be handled in accordance with current data protection laws.

Each time a user accesses a page on our website and records their data, this data transaction is saved in a protocol file for data protection purposes. This data is not passed on to third parties.

In particular, the following data records are saved for each data recovery:

-Recovered data file name

-Recovery date and time

-Amount of data transmitted

-Information on whether the recovery was successful

The IP address of the user and / or the computer from which the query was made, as well as the browser used, are also saved. This information, however, is not saved together with user-specific data. In this way, it is impossible to deduce which user provided each data.

Use and Purpose

You can register to receive newsletters from our website. Your information will only be used to record and organize the sending of the information in question.
